medium: Stoneware with Oribe glaze, iron painting
title: Bowl (hachi)
marks: Signature and Mark Bottom: [ 百＿窯　秀剛 ]
description: irregularly shaped ceramic bowl withy flat bottom and high sides; irregular design and texture on outer walls with hunky, wavy horizontal lines, impressed rectangles, etc.; dark earth tone glaze with some white patches and rust colored swirls; interior has a series of raised irregular rings
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
